Providing Bibliograhic Services From Machine-Radable Data Bases - The Library's Role .A De Gennaro, Richard Libraries will play a key role in providing access to data bases, but not by subscribing to tape services and establishing local processing centers as is commonly assumed.. High costs and the nature of the demand will make this approach unfeasible.. It is more likely that the library's reference staff will develop the capability of serving as a broker between the local campus user and the various regional or specialized retail distribution centers which exist or will be established.. .X 18	2	879 34	1	879 49	1	879 53	1	879 59	1	879 124	1	879 127	2	879 129	1	879 141	1	879 145	1	879 152	1	879 164	1	879 190	1	879 191	1	879 197	1	879
